description:
With the Odd Jobs looking for the Tendoshu, things heat up on the Liberation Army`s main ship. Shijaku has promised his cooperation to Nobunobu, but now he must convince his comrades.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Delinquent`s Kid Has Long Neck Hair
Les enfants de délinquants ont de longs cheveux couvrant leur nuque
Yankee no Kodomo wa Eriashi ga Nagai
ヤンキーの子供は襟足が長い
